languages.text: {n}Каждое звено плана Комиссара в отдельности имеет право на существование. Но в сумме своей они имеют столь ничтожный шанс на успех, что соглашаться с этой стратегией — настоящее безумие.{/n}

{n}Every step in the Commissar's plan, when taken separately, seems viable enough. When combined together, however, the chances of success become so ludicrously slim that only a complete madman would agree to this strategy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Каждое звено плана Комиссара в отдельности имеет право на существование. Но в сумме своей они имеют столь ничтожный шанс на успех, что соглашаться с этой стратегией — настоящее безумие.{/n}

{n}Every step in the Commissar's plan, when taken separately, seems viable enough. When combined together, however, the chances of success become so ludicrously slim that only a complete madman would agree to this strategy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}政委计划中的每一步如果单独拿出来看，似乎都是可行的。然而，若是把这些步骤放在一起，那整个计划的成功几率实在是渺茫得可笑。恐怕只有彻头彻尾的疯子，才会真的打算实施这样的计划。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Every step in the Commissar's plan, when taken separately, seems viable enough. When combined together, however, the chances of success become so ludicrously slim that only a complete madman would agree to this strategy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}政委计划中的每一步如果单独拿出来看，似乎都是可行的。然而，若是把这些步骤放在一起，那整个计划的成功几率实在是渺茫得可笑。恐怕只有彻头彻尾的疯子，才会真的打算实施这样的计划。{/n}

languages.text: {n}コミッサーの計画は段階的に見ると、十分に実行可能なように思えた。しかし、すべてをひとつの計画としてみなすと成功の可能性は著しく低くなり、この作戦に同意するのは完全な狂人だけだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Every step in the Commissar's plan, when taken separately, seems viable enough. When combined together, however, the chances of success become so ludicrously slim that only a complete madman would agree to this strategy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーの計画は段階的に見ると、十分に実行可能なように思えた。しかし、すべてをひとつの計画としてみなすと成功の可能性は著しく低くなり、この作戦に同意するのは完全な狂人だけだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cada paso del plan del Comisario como evento aislado parece razonablemente viable. Al combinarlos, sin embargo, las probabilidades de éxito son tan absurdamente bajas que solo un loco desesperado aceptaría su estrategia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Every step in the Commissar's plan, when taken separately, seems viable enough. When combined together, however, the chances of success become so ludicrously slim that only a complete madman would agree to this strategy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cada paso del plan del Comisario como evento aislado parece razonablemente viable. Al combinarlos, sin embargo, las probabilidades de éxito son tan absurdamente bajas que solo un loco desesperado aceptaría su estrategia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Prises séparément, les différentes étapes du plan du commissaire ont l'air parfaitement viables. Lorsqu'on les met bout à bout, cependant, les chances de réussite paraissent tellement faibles qu'il faudrait être complètement insensé pour accepter d'y participer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Every step in the Commissar's plan, when taken separately, seems viable enough. When combined together, however, the chances of success become so ludicrously slim that only a complete madman would agree to this strategy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Prises séparément, les différentes étapes du plan du commissaire ont l'air parfaitement viables. Lorsqu'on les met bout à bout, cependant, les chances de réussite paraissent tellement faibles qu'il faudrait être complètement insensé pour accepter d'y participer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jeder Schritt im Plan des Kommissars klingt einzeln betrachtet sinnvoll und durchführbar. Zusammengenommen allerdings werden die Erfolgschancen so absurd gering, dass nur ein Wahnsinniger dieser Strategie folgen würde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Every step in the Commissar's plan, when taken separately, seems viable enough. When combined together, however, the chances of success become so ludicrously slim that only a complete madman would agree to this strategy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Her adım tek tek ele alındığında, Komiser'in planı uygulanabilir duruyor. Fakat büyük resme bakıldığında başarı oranı o kadar düşük ki sadece delinin teki bu stratejiye onay verir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Every step in the Commissar's plan, when taken separately, seems viable enough. When combined together, however, the chances of success become so ludicrously slim that only a complete madman would agree to this strategy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser'in planındaki her adım tek tek ele alındığında uygulanabilir duruyor. Fakat büyük resme bakıldığında başarı oranı o kadar düşük ki sadece delinin teki bu stratejiye onay verebilir.{/n}
